If you are fluent with [BeautifulSoup][1], you could just add [soupselect][2] to your libs. Soupselect is a CSS selector extension for BeautifulSoup. Usage: >>> from BeautifulSoup import BeautifulSoup as Soup >>> from soupselect import select >>> import urllib >>> soup = Soup(urllib.urlopen('http://slashdot.org/')) >>> select(soup, 'div.title h3') [
